function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Co-location of IBEM devices with reference sensors in an office environment may lead to potential contamination and spread of contagious diseases if proper hygiene and cleaning protocols are not followed.","Impact":"Unmitigated spread of contagious diseases in the office, leading to illness and reduced productivity.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols for handling and cleaning the devices, including regular disinfection and handwashing. Provide training to personnel on proper cleaning procedures.","Technologies":"Utilize antimicrobial coatings on the devices, implement UV sterilization chambers for periodic disinfection of the devices.","People":"Office occupants, maintenance staff, and cleaning personnel.","Owner":"Facility management, health and safety officers, and cleaning staff."}]}
